title: 3% Niacinamide Cleanser
content: A gentle foaming cleanser that minimises enlarged pores, reduces acne-causing sebum, and evens out skin tone. It's also non-comedogenic and sulphate-free with a pH of 5.0 to restore skin balance.

title: 23% Vitamin C Serum
content: Formulated with advanced antioxidants and L-Ascorbic Acid to achieve radiant complexion, reduce dark circles and the appearance of acne scars. It's the essential part of your routine for firmer, brighter, and smoother skin.

title: 14 Multi-Peptide Moisturiser
content: Combining 14 amino acids and hyaluronic acid to prevent dryness and to strengthen skin barrier for better hydration for all skin types. The Daily Moisturiser is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and gives your skin a healthy and hydrated finish.
